keyFeatures.first: Employee information centralization and management.Leave and attendance tracking automation.Payroll processing and taxation management.Recruitment, applicant tracking, and onboarding tools.Performance appraisal and feedback systems.

keyFeatures.third: Benefits administration and enrollment.Succession planning for talent development.Integration capabilities with other systems.Robust security features and access control.
